DOC.brief_summary: An open label, multi-centre, non-interventional post-marketing surveillance to monitor the safety and/or efficacy of AVODART administered in Korean BPH patients according to the prescribing information
DOC.criteria: The Korean BPH Patients administrated dutasteride according to the prescribing information women and children and adolescents. patients with hypersensitivity to dutasteride, other 5alpha reductase inhibitors, or any of the excipients.
